DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Use Youth e-Cigarette Flavor Preference Questionnaire Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing._The time of life between childhood and maturity.  This period overlaps with adolescence._Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking._A solution of essential constituents of a complex material; a substance removed from another substance._The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tobacco Use Youth Electronic Cigarette Extract Preference Questionnaire Flavor Preference
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing._The time of life between childhood and maturity.  This period overlaps with adolescence._A battery-powered electronic device designed to atomize a nicotine-containing liquid solution for inhalation in a manner that simulates smoking a tobacco cigarette._The distinctive taste of something as detected in the mouth and also by the nose._The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Concepts.definition: Use of tobacco in any form, e.g., smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Property.preferredName: Youth Electronic Cigarette Flavor Preference Questionnaire
Property.preferredDefinition: The time of life between childhood and maturity.  This period overlaps with adolescence.:A battery-powered electronic device designed to atomize a nicotine-containing liquid solution for inhalation in a manner that simulates smoking a tobacco cigarette.:The distinctive taste of something as detected in the mouth and also by the nose.:The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.:Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

Concepts.definition: The time of life between childhood and maturity.  This period overlaps with adolescence.
A battery-powered electronic device designed to atomize a nicotine-containing liquid solution for inhalation in a manner that simulates smoking a tobacco cigarette.
The distinctive taste of something as detected in the mouth and also by the nose.
The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
